title: low fps
body: today my game started to drop to 9 fps and went to 40 and fluctuated very low all game and it never does that  i need help in how to fix this

replies.body: I had the exact same thing happen today, I think intel released a new driver 'cause I had to manually update it.  (idk if your card is intel or not though, just same symptoms)

There are many things that can cause FPS fluctuations and drops, however, most of the time they're linked to misbehaving display drivers or windows power settings. Our [FPS troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) covers these and a few other common solutions, so I recommend you check it out.

Let me know the results.
